name: Quick Trigger! - Android (LowRezJam 2016)
description:
Quick Trigger is a fast paced western action game, for two players, in which you have to shoot your friend as fast as possible when the countdown reaches 0.

The first to shoot the other player wins, unless the countdown didn't finish,in which case they lose.

You can check my other games here: (Itch.io) and here: (Google Play)

Made for LowRezJam 2016

Made with Construct 2 Personal Edition;

Art made with Paint.Net.
